00027 /* USB Standard Device Descriptor */
00028 const uint8_t USB_DeviceDescriptor[] = {
00029   USB_DEVICE_DESC_SIZE,              /* bLength */
00030   USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,        /* bDescriptorType */
00031   WBVAL(0x0200), /* 2.00 */          /* bcdUSB */
00032   0x00,                              /* bDeviceClass */
00033   0x00,                              /* bDeviceSubClass */
00034   0x00,                              /* bDeviceProtocol */
00035   USB_MAX_PACKET0,                   /* bMaxPacketSize0 */
00036   WBVAL(0xC251),                     /* idVendor */
00037   WBVAL(0x1303),                     /* idProduct */
00038   WBVAL(0x0100), /* 1.00 */          /* bcdDevice */
00039   0x04,                              /* iManufacturer */
00040   0x20,                              /* iProduct */
00041   0x48,                              /* iSerialNumber */
00042   0x01                               /* bNumConfigurations */
00043 };
00044 
00045 /* USB Configuration Descriptor */
00046 /*   All Descriptors (Configuration, Interface, Endpoint, Class, Vendor */
00047 const uint8_t USB_ConfigDescriptor[] = {
00048 /* Configuration 1 */
00049   USB_CONFIGUARTION_DESC_SIZE,       /* bDescriptorType */
00050   USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE, /* bDescriptorType */
00051   WBVAL(                             /* wTotalLength */
00052     1*USB_CONFIGUARTION_DESC_SIZE +
00053     1*USB_INTERFACE_DESC_SIZE     +
00054     2*USB_ENDPOINT_DESC_SIZE
00055   ),
00056   0x01,                              /* bNumInterfaces */
00057   0x01,                              /* bConfigurationValue */
00058   0x00,                              /* iConfiguration */
00059   USB_CONFIG_BUS_POWERED /*|*/       /* bmAttributes */
00060 /*USB_CONFIG_REMOTE_WAKEUP*/,
00061   USB_CONFIG_POWER_MA(100),          /* bMaxPower */
00062 /* Interface 0, Alternate Setting 0, MSC Class */
00063   USB_INTERFACE_DESC_SIZE,           /* bLength */
00064   USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,     /* bDescriptorType */
00065   0x00,                              /* bInterfaceNumber */
00066   0x00,                              /* bAlternateSetting */
00067   0x02,                              /* bNumEndpoints */
00068   USB_DEVICE_CLASS_STORAGE,          /* bInterfaceClass */
00069   MSC_SUBCLASS_SCSI,                 /* bInterfaceSubClass */
00070   MSC_PROTOCOL_BULK_ONLY,            /* bInterfaceProtocol */
00071   0x62,                              /* iInterface */
00072 /* Bulk In Endpoint */
00073   USB_ENDPOINT_DESC_SIZE,            /* bLength */
00074   USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,      /* bDescriptorType */
00075   USB_ENDPOINT_IN(2),                /* bEndpointAddress */
00076   USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_BULK,            /* bmAttributes */
00077   WBVAL(0x0040),                     /* wMaxPacketSize */
00078   0,                                 /* bInterval */
00079 /* Bulk Out Endpoint */
00080   USB_ENDPOINT_DESC_SIZE,            /* bLength */
00081   USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,      /* bDescriptorType */
00082   USB_ENDPOINT_OUT(2),               /* bEndpointAddress */
00083   USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_BULK,            /* bmAttributes */
00084   WBVAL(0x0040),                     /* wMaxPacketSize */
00085   0,                                 /* bInterval */
00086 /* Terminator */
00087   0                                  /* bLength */
00088 };
